name: luckyDayPopUpAppearsTest
description: This test verifies that after selecting three drinks, the Lucky Day  pop-up is displayed.
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that after selecting three drinks, the Lucky Day pop-up is displayed.

testStage.description: This test verifies that after selecting three drinks, the Lucky Day  pop-up is displayed.

steps.name: Click on cup with title: Cappuccino
Click on cup with title: Flat White
Click on cup with title: Cafe Breve

attachments.name: Image name = PICTURE Test Name = RegularTests

labels.name: story
labels.value: User can sees Lucky Day popup after choosing 3 drinks
